mapper.insert: insert into tbl_report values (tbl_report_seq.nextval, #{prj_no}, 'N', sysdate, #{rpt_writer}, sysdate, #{rpt_mod_writer}) SELECT tbl_report_seq.currval FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT trd.*, tr.prj_no, tr.RPT_WRITER, tpi.EMAIL, tm.name, tpi.AUTHORITY FROM TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd JOIN TBL_REPORT tr ON tr.RPT_NO = trd.RPT_NO JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = tr.RPT_WRITER JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.email = tm.EMAIL

SELECT trd.*, tr.prj_no, tr.RPT_WRITER, tpi.EMAIL, tpi.AUTHORITY FROM TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd JOIN TBL_REPORT tr ON tr.RPT_NO = trd.RPT_NO JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = tr.RPT_WRITER WHERE tpi.email = #{email}

SELECT trd.*, tr.prj_no, tr.RPT_WRITER, tpi.authority, tpi.EMAIL, tm.NAME FROM TBL_REPORT tr JOIN TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd ON trd.RPT_NO = tr.RPT_NO JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = tr.RPT_WRITER JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.EMAIL = tm.EMAIL

SELECT trd.*, tr.prj_no, tr.RPT_WRITER, tpi.authority, tpi.EMAIL, tm.NAME FROM TBL_REPORT tr JOIN TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd ON trd.RPT_NO = tr.RPT_NO JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = tr.RPT_WRITER JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.EMAIL = tm.EMAIL WHERE tr.prj_no = #{prj_no}

SELECT trd.*, tr.prj_no, tr.RPT_WRITER, tpi.authority, tpi.EMAIL, tm.NAME FROM TBL_REPORT tr JOIN TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd ON trd.RPT_NO = tr.RPT_NO JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tpi.PRJ_IN_NO = tr.RPT_WRITER JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tpi.EMAIL = tm.EMAIL WHERE rpt_writer = #{prj_in_no}
SELECT trd.* FROM TBL_REPORT tr JOIN TBL_REPORT_DETAIL trd ON tr.RPT_NO = trd.RPT_NO AND RPT_WRITE_D8 >= #{rpt_write_d8} AND rpt_write_d8 < #{rpt_write_d8}+1
